page.title: 15Youth Military Band S.on A.
page.content: Clubs. The Band has about 40-45 members, with ages between 10 and 21. It meets for two hours each Sunday and Monday at the Drill Hall.Included are bugles,trumpets,drums,tubas,clarinets and a big bass drum.The Band's shield has three panthers with an upright arrow in between.A red tunic has just been added to the uniform.These are hot but they look very smart! The Bandmaster organises everything and teaches the woodwind.There is also a Recruit Officer,a Drill Master,and a Brass Instructor.The Band enters many competitions and has been on T.V..In 1985 the Band is going on a tour to Luxembourg,Belgium,Holland,and West Germany.Unlike many Youth Marching Bands,the children are taught to read music which is carried on parade with the instruments.The Band is committed to a policy of continual improvement.
